data.question: What is the formula weight of compound 1a?

data.answer: The reaction of Ge94- clusters with SbPh3 in refluxing ethylenediamine at 118 °C for 4 days

data.answer: The compound with vinyl-functionalized bismuth-exchanged clusters

data.question: Is the ES-mass spectrum of the reaction of Ge94- clusters with SbPh3 at 75 °C for 3 days dominated by the monoexchanged anion (SbGe8)-?
